snippet: Related Companies is promoting a proposal to restart the redevelopment of Pennsylvania Station by making a community college the anchor tenant in the post office across Eighth Avenue.
abstract: Related Companies is hoping to improve viability of plans to redevelop Penn Station by proposing to make Borough of Manhattan Community College anchor tenant in Eighth Avenue post office building that would house relocated train station; Related would build new train hall, train platforms and underground connections to current Penn Station, and in return would receive college's current campus, potentially valuable property for residential development.
lead_paragraph: Related Companies is promoting a proposal to restart the redevelopment of Pennsylvania Station by making a community college the anchor tenant in the post office across Eighth Avenue.

headline.seo: New Proposal for Transforming Penn Station
headline.main: New Idea for Penn Station Entails Relocating a College
headline.print_headline: New Idea for Penn Station Entails Relocating a College
